metadata.synopsis: One liner of a haunted painting in the atelier of Jannath Estate  that will say some insult with the voice of Kerri Evenfield, the ghost that is haunting the whole mansion. This particular portrait is Jannath's, the woman Oskar chose over Kerri, so Kerri's reaction is different.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_BringOskarHomego to CTY_Main_A -263; 38; -44Interact with portrait in that position.

0.speaker: GROUP_LOW_OskarsBeloved_Kerri
0.text: Take the piggy bank bitch. Burn her! Roast her!
